short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now you can play Among Us right in your Chrome Browser, ad-free and offline!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now you can play Among Us right in your Chrome™ Browser, ad-free and offline! Enjoy this popular multiplayer game without needing an internet connection.

Among Us is a thrilling game of teamwork and betrayal set in space. In this offline version, you can enjoy the excitement of completing tasks and finding impostors without online distractions.

In Among Us, you play as either a crewmate or an impostor. Crewmates must complete various tasks around the ship while trying to figure out who among them is the impostor. The impostor’s goal is to sabotage tasks and eliminate crewmates without getting caught. The game ends when all tasks are completed or when the impostor is ejected.

Instructions:

On your computer, use the arrow keys to move around, and click to interact with objects and complete tasks.
